mapper.select: select idx, img_url, age, title, release_date, (select round(avg(score),1)*2 from memo where idx=m.idx) ord from movie m order by ${value} desc nulls last
select idx, img_url, age, title, release_date, (select round(avg(score),1)*2 from memo where idx=m.idx) ord from movie m order by ord desc nulls last
select idx, img_url, age, title, release_date, (select round(avg(score),1)*2 from memo where idx=m.idx) ord from movie m where release_date > CURRENT_DATE order by release_date

select idx, title, age, director, actors, content, genre, release_date, runtime, img_url, preview, rank, people, act_img_url, (select round(avg(score),1)*2 from memo where idx=m.idx) ord from movie m where idx=#{idx}
